thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 25 of 99
thread.title: Irin

author: Irin
title: Irin
text:
The services are extrimely professional. Delivery was very quick as promised even earlier then expected. The only reason for four stars is the packaging for the item.
Simce the items offered are mostly designer items , it is expected that packaging will represent such.
My item ordered was beautifu l but the small bag inside the box and box itself were disappointing . Both were ripped in a couple of places and since the item was bought as a present, I had to figure out where to get a nice looking box that will still reflect the designer item inside. It was not the impression you expect when substantial amount paid.
Other then that,everything else was really good and worthy of using this site.
